content.text: Trial 4/5, Stage 'ytraverse1': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The image shows a groove oriented vertically with the X-axis aligned in the direction of the groove. The red circle indicates the user's gaze is focused to the left of the vertically oriented groove.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [250, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
